name: Common Cold
generalAdvice: Rest, stay hydrated, and maintain good hygiene

name: Anemia

vitamins.name: Iron
vitamins.benefit: Essential for red blood cell production

generalAdvice: Consult doctor for blood tests, avoid tea/coffee with meals

name: Osteoporosis
generalAdvice: Weight-bearing exercises, adequate sun exposure, avoid smoking

name: Diabetes Type 2
generalAdvice: Regular exercise, monitor blood sugar, maintain healthy weight

name: Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
generalAdvice: Reduce sodium intake, regular exercise, stress management

name: Depression
generalAdvice: Seek professional help, regular exercise, social connections

name: Arthritis
generalAdvice: Low-impact exercise, maintain healthy weight, hot/cold therapy

name: Insomnia
generalAdvice: Sleep schedule, avoid screens before bed, relaxation techniques

name: Acne
generalAdvice: Gentle cleansing, avoid touching face, reduce dairy and sugar

name: Migraine
generalAdvice: Identify triggers, regular sleep schedule, stress management

name: Tuberculosis (TB)

vitamins.name: Vitamin D
vitamins.benefit: Boosts immune defense against TB bacteria

vitamins.name: Zinc
vitamins.benefit: Improves immune cell function and healing

generalAdvice: Complete antibiotic treatment, eat nutritious meals, rest well, avoid alcohol and smoking.

name: Malaria

vitamins.name: Iron
vitamins.benefit: Restores red blood cells destroyed by malaria

generalAdvice: Complete prescribed antimalarial treatment, rest well, stay hydrated, and use mosquito protection.

name: Dengue Fever
generalAdvice: Drink plenty of fluids, monitor platelets, avoid NSAIDs, and rest completely until recovery.

name: Chikungunya
generalAdvice: Rest well, stay hydrated, manage joint pain with warm compresses, and eat anti-inflammatory foods.

name: Typhoid Fever
generalAdvice: Take full antibiotic course, eat light easily digestible meals, maintain hydration, and rest.

name: Cholera
generalAdvice: Rehydrate immediately with ORS, avoid raw food or street water, maintain strict hygiene.

name: Hepatitis A
generalAdvice: Avoid oily food, rest adequately, maintain hydration, and avoid alcohol.

name: Hepatitis B
generalAdvice: Avoid alcohol, eat balanced diet, maintain hygiene, get vaccinated if not immune.

name: Hepatitis C
generalAdvice: Avoid alcohol, follow antiviral therapy strictly, and eat liver-friendly meals.

name: Leptospirosis
generalAdvice: Avoid contact with contaminated water, maintain hygiene, and complete antibiotic treatment.

name: Rabies
generalAdvice: Immediate post-exposure vaccination and wound cleaning are critical. Avoid delay in treatment.

name: Measles
generalAdvice: Get adequate rest, stay hydrated, maintain hygiene, and ensure vaccination for prevention.

name: Mumps

foods.name: Soups and broths
foods.benefit: Soothes sore jaw and aids recovery

generalAdvice: Rest, drink plenty of fluids, eat soft foods, and isolate to prevent spreading.

name: Rubella
generalAdvice: Ensure rest, stay isolated, maintain hydration, and vaccination (MMR) prevents infection.

name: Chickenpox (Varicella)

foods.name: Oatmeal
foods.benefit: Soothes skin when used as a bath or eaten

generalAdvice: Avoid scratching, use calamine lotion, rest, and stay isolated until scabs heal.

name: Influenza (Seasonal Flu)
generalAdvice: Rest, drink warm fluids, use steam inhalation, and get annual flu vaccination.

name: COVID-19
generalAdvice: Isolate, rest, stay hydrated, eat nutritious foods, and follow doctor’s guidance for medications.

name: Japanese Encephalitis
generalAdvice: Seek hospital care immediately, control fever, rest, and ensure vaccination for prevention.

name: Swine Flu (H1N1)
generalAdvice: Rest, stay isolated, drink warm fluids, follow prescribed antivirals, and get annual flu vaccination.

name: Kala-azar (Visceral Leishmaniasis)
generalAdvice: Seek prompt treatment with antileishmanial drugs, maintain nutrition, and prevent sandfly bites.

name: Filariasis (Elephantiasis)
generalAdvice: Use prescribed antifilarial drugs, maintain hygiene, avoid mosquito bites, and elevate swollen limbs.

name: Leprosy (Hansen’s Disease)
generalAdvice: Take multidrug therapy as prescribed, maintain skin care, and report nerve symptoms early.

name: Diarrheal Diseases (Rotavirus, E. coli, etc.)

vitamins.name: Zinc
vitamins.benefit: Reduces duration and severity of diarrhea

generalAdvice: Drink ORS, maintain hydration, eat light foods, and avoid street food or unclean water.

name: Whooping Cough (Pertussis)
generalAdvice: Rest, drink warm fluids, avoid cold air, and complete vaccination (DPT booster).

name: Pneumonia
generalAdvice: Follow antibiotics as prescribed, stay hydrated, rest, and avoid smoking or pollution.

name: Hand, Foot and Mouth Disease
generalAdvice: Rest, stay hydrated, maintain hygiene, and avoid acidic or spicy foods.

name: Polio (Poliomyelitis)
generalAdvice: Vaccination (OPV/IPV) is key to prevention; physiotherapy helps with muscle recovery.

name: Tetanus
generalAdvice: Get tetanus toxoid vaccination, maintain wound hygiene, and seek immediate medical care.

name: Scabies
generalAdvice: Apply prescribed anti-scabies lotion, wash bedding/clothes, and treat all close contacts.

name: Fungal Skin Infections (Ringworm, etc.)
generalAdvice: Keep skin clean and dry, use antifungal creams, avoid sharing towels or clothes, and wear loose cotton.

name: Diabetes Mellitus (Type 2)
generalAdvice: Monitor blood sugar regularly, exercise, eat low-GI foods, and avoid refined sugars.

name: Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)

vitamins.name: CoQ10
vitamins.benefit: Improves heart energy and BP control

generalAdvice: Reduce salt intake, exercise regularly, manage stress, and avoid smoking and alcohol.

name: Coronary Artery Disease (Heart Disease)
generalAdvice: Exercise regularly, eat a heart-healthy diet, avoid smoking, and maintain a healthy weight.

name: Stroke (Cerebrovascular Accident)
generalAdvice: Control BP and sugar, exercise regularly, eat low-salt diet, and avoid smoking.

name: Obesity
generalAdvice: Exercise regularly, eat portion-controlled balanced meals, and reduce processed food intake.

name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
generalAdvice: Quit smoking, avoid air pollution, maintain healthy weight, and follow pulmonary rehab.

name: Asthma
generalAdvice: Avoid allergens, use inhaler as prescribed, exercise moderately, and eat anti-inflammatory foods.

name: Cancer (various types — oral, breast, cervical, lung, etc.)
generalAdvice: Follow oncology treatment plan, maintain nutrition, avoid smoking, and include antioxidant-rich foods.

name: Chronic Kidney Disease
generalAdvice: Control BP and diabetes, limit salt and protein, avoid processed foods, and follow renal diet.

name: Osteoarthritis
generalAdvice: Maintain healthy weight, exercise regularly, use joint-friendly movements, and eat anti-inflammatory foods.

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis

vitamins.name: Vitamin C
vitamins.benefit: Supports collagen and reduces oxidative stress

generalAdvice: Maintain healthy weight, exercise gently, manage stress, and follow anti-inflammatory diet.

name: Thyroid Disorders (Hypo/Hyperthyroidism)
generalAdvice: Avoid excessive soy, manage stress, monitor TSH levels, and take medications as prescribed.

name: Anemia (especially Iron Deficiency Anemia)

vitamins.name: Iron
vitamins.benefit: Essential for red blood cell production

generalAdvice: Consult doctor for blood tests, avoid tea/coffee with meals, and supplement as prescribed.

name: Peptic Ulcer Disease
generalAdvice: Avoid NSAIDs, alcohol, spicy food, and smoking; eat small, frequent meals.

name: Depression
generalAdvice: Seek counseling, exercise regularly, get sunlight, and maintain a balanced diet.

name: Anxiety Disorders
generalAdvice: Practice deep breathing, meditation, avoid caffeine, and get adequate sleep.

name: Alzheimer’s Disease

vitamins.name: Vitamin E
vitamins.benefit: Protects brain cells from oxidative damage

generalAdvice: Stay mentally active, eat a Mediterranean diet, exercise, and maintain social engagement.

name: Parkinson’s Disease
generalAdvice: Follow neurologist’s treatment, exercise, eat fiber-rich foods, and manage stress.

name: Cataract
generalAdvice: Wear UV-protective glasses, eat antioxidant-rich foods, and avoid smoking.

name: Migraine

vitamins.name: Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin)
vitamins.benefit: Supports energy metabolism in brain cells

generalAdvice: Stay hydrated, manage stress, avoid trigger foods, and maintain regular sleep schedule.

name: Gout
symptoms: Joint pain (especially in the big toe)
generalAdvice: Avoid red meat, alcohol, and high-purine foods; stay hydrated and maintain healthy weight.

name: Psoriasis
generalAdvice: Moisturize skin, avoid triggers (stress, cold), and get moderate sunlight exposure.

name: Vitiligo
generalAdvice: Avoid skin injury and stress, protect skin from sunburn, and follow prescribed treatment.

name: Eczema (Dermatitis)
generalAdvice: Avoid harsh soaps, stay moisturized, wear breathable clothes, and manage stress.

name: Glaucoma
generalAdvice: Regular eye check-ups, avoid eye strain, use prescribed drops, and control blood pressure.

name: Conjunctivitis (Eye Flu)
generalAdvice: Avoid touching eyes, maintain hygiene, wash hands frequently, and avoid contact lenses.

name: Sinusitis
generalAdvice: Stay hydrated, inhale steam, avoid allergens, and use nasal saline rinses.

name: Tonsillitis
generalAdvice: Gargle with warm salt water, rest, drink fluids, and avoid cold foods or drinks.

name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)

vitamins.name: Vitamin C
vitamins.benefit: Acidifies urine to prevent bacteria growth

generalAdvice: Drink plenty of water, maintain hygiene, urinate regularly, and avoid tight clothing.

name: Gallstones
generalAdvice: Avoid fatty foods, eat smaller meals, maintain healthy weight, and stay hydrated.

name: Kidney Stones
generalAdvice: Drink plenty of water, limit high-oxalate foods, reduce salt intake, and follow doctor’s guidance.

name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
generalAdvice: Identify triggers, eat small frequent meals, manage stress, and stay hydrated.

name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD / Acidity)
generalAdvice: Avoid spicy/fatty foods, eat smaller meals, don’t lie down after eating, and maintain healthy weight.

name: Fatty Liver Disease (Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver)
generalAdvice: Exercise regularly, maintain healthy weight, limit sugar and fats, and avoid alcohol.

name: Cirrhosis of Liver
generalAdvice: Avoid alcohol, limit salt, follow prescribed medications, and maintain healthy diet.

name: Anorexia and Malnutrition
generalAdvice: Eat small frequent meals, monitor nutrition, seek psychological support, and consider supplements.

name: Sickle Cell Anemia
generalAdvice: Stay hydrated, avoid extreme temperatures, get vaccinations, and follow medical therapy.

name: Thalassemia
generalAdvice: Regular blood transfusions if prescribed, monitor iron levels, and maintain nutritious diet.

name: Epilepsy
generalAdvice: Take anti-seizure medication as prescribed, avoid triggers, get adequate sleep, and maintain balanced diet.

name: Autism Spectrum Disorder
generalAdvice: Early intervention therapies, structured environment, balanced diet, and follow-up with specialists.
